add-translation.alreadyAdded: ‚ùå This announcement is already translated in {{language}}.
add-translation.descriptionMaxLength: ‚ùå The description must be less than 4000 characters.
add-translation.footerMaxLength: ‚ùå The footer must be less than 2048 characters.
add-translation.titleMaxLength: ‚ùå The title must be less than 256 characters.
add-translation.urlNotValid: ‚ùå The provided URL is not valid.

add.notValidColor:
‚ùå Invalid color format, try one of the following {{validColors}}.
You can use an online color picker or use one of the following valid names:
https://i.imgur.com/mGKeXCT.png
add.notValidImage: ‚ùå Invalid image url, make sure it ends with a image extension (.png, .jpg, etc).

color.label: Color
color.placeholder: Indicate the color, can be a name (red, blue), hexadecimal value (#ffcc66) or rgb (rgb(16,16,16))

help.description:
Hi üëã, I'm **{{username}}**, a bot that allows you to post announcements in multiple languages on your server.

__**Main commands**__
‚Ä¢ Use {{add_command}} to add an announcement.
‚Ä¢ Use {{add_translation_command}} to add a translation to an announcement.
‚Ä¢ Use {{publish_command}} to publish the announcement.

list.notAnnouncements: ‚ùå This server doesn't have announcements, create one with `/announcements add`.

publish.errorPerms: ‚ùå You don't have permissions to send messages in that channel.
publish.cannotSend: ‚ùå I can't send messages in that channel.

edit.defaultError: ‚ùå An error has occurred while trying to edit the announcement, please try again.
